name: Leonidas Palios
content: Leonidas Palios, University of Ioannina University of Ioannina Department of Computer Science and Engineering Leonidas Palios Professor Research Interests Design and analysis of algorithms Computational geometry Graph theory Algorithm visulaization Data structures Curriculum Vita 2014 [in greek, in english] Teaching Fall semester 2015-16: Theory of Computation Fall semester 2015-16: Graph Theory (graduate) Spring semester 2015-16: Discrete Mathematics I Publications
